vulnerability_findings.name: use-abi-encodecall-instead-of-encodewithselector

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in LibSafeMathRichErrors.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (LibSafeMathRichErrors.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'LibSafeMathRichErrors.Uint256BinOpError' (LibSafeMathRichErrors.sol#37-52) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'LibSafeMathRichErrors.Uint96BinOpError' (LibSafeMathRichErrors.sol#54-69) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.message: Function 'LibSafeMathRichErrors.Uint256DowncastError' (LibSafeMathRichErrors.sol#88-101) is not in mixedCase
